name: cy/sqids-php-74
description: This is a fork of the original Sqids PHP library.(https://github.com/sqids/sqids-php) You should use that. This fork is only for PHP 7.4 compatibility and will not be maintained.

suggest.ext-bcmath: Required to use BC Math arbitrary precision mathematics (*).
suggest.ext-gmp: Required to use GNU multiple precision mathematics (*).
